paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the BRCA2 variant identified in a patient with breast cancer.

patients.phenotype: left breast invasive ductal carcinoma, recurrent breast cancer

individual_records.phenotype_details: left breast invasive ductal carcinoma, developed erythema nodosum after olaparib treatment
individual_records.evidence_sentence: Germline mutations of BRCA1/2 were assessed using BRACAnalysis CDx® (Myriad Genetics, Salt Lake City, UT, USA), and BRCA2 1241 delC was identified as a deleterious mutation.

functional_data.summary: The BRCA2 1241 delC variant is identified as a deleterious mutation.

variants.additional_notes: The variant was identified in a patient with a family history of breast and ovarian cancer.
key_quotes: Germline mutations of BRCA1/2 were assessed using BRACAnalysis CDx® (Myriad Genetics, Salt Lake City, UT, USA), and BRCA2 1241 delC was identified as a deleterious mutation.

extraction_metadata.notes: The extraction was straightforward as the paper provided clear information on the BRCA2 variant.
